dimensions:

title: Bowl
description: Large bowl, thinly turned of single piece of wood. From small circular foot with concave underside, bowl flares up and out to calyx form with tapered rim. Highly striated wood grain. Four oval knots, three near foot and one higher on side of body. Wood turned to create translucency.
name: Bowl
